verses.verse: O come <WH3212>, let us sing <WH7442> unto the LORD <WH3068>: let us make a joyful noise <WH7321> to the rock <WH6697> of our salvation <WH3468>.
Let us come <WH6923> before his presence <WH6440> with thanksgiving <WH8426>, and make a joyful noise <WH7321> unto him with psalms <WH2158>. come: Heb. prevent his face
For the LORD <WH3068> is a great <WH1419> God <WH410>, and a great <WH1419> King <WH4428> above all gods <WH430>.
In his hand <WH3027> are the deep places <WH4278> of the earth <WH776>: the strength <WH8443> of the hills <WH2022> is his also. In: Heb. In whose the strength: or, the heights of the hills are his
The sea <WH3220> is his, and he made <WH6213> it: and his hands <WH3027> formed <WH3335> the dry <WH3006> land. The sea: Heb. Whose the sea is
O come <WH935>, let us worship <WH7812> and bow down <WH3766>: let us kneel <WH1288> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> our maker <WH6213>.
For he is our God <WH430>; and we are the people <WH5971> of his pasture <WH4830>, and the sheep <WH6629> of his hand <WH3027>. To day <WH3117> if ye will hear <WH8085> his voice <WH6963>,
Harden <WH7185> not your heart <WH3824>, as in the provocation <WH4808>, and as in the day <WH3117> of temptation <WH4531> in the wilderness <WH4057>: provocation: Heb. contention
When your fathers <WH1> tempted <WH5254> me, proved <WH974> me, and saw <WH7200> my work <WH6467>.

Forty <WH705> years <WH8141> long was I grieved <WH6962> with this generation <WH1755>, and said <WH559>, It is a people <WH5971> that do err <WH8582> in their heart <WH3824>, and they have not known <WH3045> my ways <WH1870>:
Unto whom I sware <WH7650> in my wrath <WH639> that they should not enter <WH935> into my rest <WH4496>. that: Heb. if they enter into my rest
